ygData.subject: Re: does Bard need charisma?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you buy it from someone who imported it to Faydwer, you ll probably pay more.  Although I paid 5 plat for it, I figure I ve saved more than that in
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:42 PM 6/29/99 -0400, BrainBoss@... wrote:
> The silk evening tunic can be found at a female vendor next to the
>Lion's Mane in Qeynos. If you hail her, she tells you that she's been
>experimenting with silks. The shirt is +5 CHA and sells for a little over 1
>plat.

If you buy it from someone who imported it to Faydwer, you'll probably pay
more. Although I paid 5 plat for it, I figure I've saved more than that in
purchases for friends, if not myself, and my commissions, even from
friends, have more than made back the extra.

Bob
